title: The Most Popular Fiction Book, Product, Novel, Gift, and Item Sold of All Time for Women, Men, and Kids: In the Whole World (2009, 2010) Tags: Romance, Amazon, History, Author, Teen, Art, Vampire, Diet
description: There's no end to the talents of Nigel Tomm. He's given us novels, films, paintings, poetry, installations and now supreme-quality abstract novel. Half abstract art, half wordless novel, Nigel Tomm's Most Popular Fiction Book cracks all our switches. Can you imagine a novel without a single word? Nigel Tomm shares his sensational vision.
author: Nigel Tomm
